page.title: 16SCHOOLS
page.content: My school is made of stone.It is 100 years old this year.It has 2 classrooms,a big hall,kitchen and cloakroom.It has a football pitch and trees all around.There is a playground with a railway and a hopscotch painted on.On the wall some circles are painted and we use them to play ball. We have 30 children in school,14 in the infant class and 16 in the junior class.School starts at 9.00am and closes at 3.15pm.Some children go home on the mini-bus,some go in cars only 1 family walk.We go swimming every Tues. afternoon.We go to Morpeth on a bus.It is great fun,it takes all afternoon.We have a playgroup in school.We have a library and we have a Bookclub.We save up our money to buy books.
